Author: GitHub
Title: GitHub project spotlight: F1 Race Replay by Tom Shaw
Description:
In this GitHub Project Spotlight, we take a look at F1 Race Replay by Tom Shaw. It’s an impressive Python application that lets you visualize Formula 1 race telemetry and replay events with a full graphical interface. See how it handles driver tire information, telemetry insights, and track status indicators in this quick overview.

#Formula1 #F1 #OpenSource
